thread.title: Construction worker killed after equipment falls on him
thread.title_full: Construction worker killed after equipment falls on him - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Construction worker killed after equipment falls on him
text:
SOUTHAVEN, Miss. (AP) - A construction worker was killed in Southaven when a piece of equipment fell on top of him.
DeSoto County Coroner Jeffrey Pounders tells The Commercial Appeal ( http://bit.ly/1K7wATT ) the 36-year-old Memphis man, whose identity has not been released, was working Tuesday at a construction site in a residential area where new homes are under construction.
According to Pounders, the worker was on an embankment using a piece of equipment that Pounders described as a dirt compactor. He said the compactor fell over on the embankment, trapping the worker underneath.
No one else was injured.
Information from: The Commercial Appeal, http://www.commercialappeal.com
